import React,{ useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Forn, Button, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' function LoginScreen() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [password, setPassword] = useState(); const { search } = useLocation(); const redirect = search ? search.split('=')[1] : '/' const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const submitHandler = (e) => { console.log("hi") } return (
